mapper.select: /* KitchenMemoMapper.selectKitchenMemo */ SELECT STORE_CD, KITCHN_MEMO_CD, KITCHN_MEMO_NM, MEMO_FG, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID FROM TB_MS_KITCHEN_MEMO WHERE STORE_CD = #{orgnCd} ORDER BY KITCHN_MEMO_CD ASC
mapper.insert: /* KitchenMemoMapper.insertKitchenMemo */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_KITCHEN_MEMO ( STORE_CD, KITCHN_MEMO_CD, KITCHN_MEMO_NM, MEMO_FG, USE_YN, REG_ID, REG_DT, MOD_ID, MOD_DT ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, #{kitchnMemoCd}, #{kitchnMemoNm}, #{memoFg}, #{useYn}, #{regId}, #{regDt}, #{modId}, #{modDt} )
